div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 166 Greece, central, before 1954 Burial: c. 250 B.C. or later (T) Contents: 35 AR Lot A Euboean League: 10 dr. Histiaea: 1 tetrob. (early) Lot B Euboean League: 9 dr. Lot C Euboean League: 15 dr. Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Wallace, NNM 134 (1956), pp. 54-6, nos. 8-10 The three lots are entered separately in the publication. They are here combined, not necessarily as parts of a single hd., rather because of the similarity of contents, and because in all cases the exact place and date of finding are unknown
